授業目的: The main goal of this course is to introduce students to the basic concepts of linguistics and knowledge about linguistic diversity via examination of data from various languages.
到達目標: After completing this course you will have acquired basic knowledge into the various subfields of linguistics, and learned how different linguistic features behave cross-linguistically, with an emphasis on Japanese and Korean (but also in relation to other languages).
授業方法:
Face-to-face classes, interactive class discussions.
Students need to pre-apply for the course during 4/1～4/3 on Kyogaku web.
Students should be prepared for discussion related to assigned readings (for the 4/12, see the attached files below).
For students who need online-learning, each lecture will be simultaneously provided by videochat(ZOOM).

第1回: 4/12. For online students, see the attached file.
トピック.授業外学習2: All students are expected to complete the assigned readings before the lecture and be prepared for classroom discussions.
